text: Majere is a small village and tiny municipality in Kežmarok District in the Prešov Region of north Slovakia. ==History== In historical records the village was first mentioned in 1431. Majere had been also known by its German name Oberschwaben. ==Geography== The municipality lies at an altitude of 475 metres and covers an area of 1.331 km² . It has a population of about 82 people. ==References== ==External links== *https://web.archive.org/web/20110308033349/http://www.mesta- obce.sk/presovsky-kraj/okres-kezmarok/majere/ Category:Villages and municipalities in Kežmarok District
title: Majere, Kežmarok District
